articles.author: Chuck Johnston and Nouran Salahieh, CNN
articles.title: Roger E. Mosley, 'Magnum P.I.' star, dies at 83 after a car crash
articles.description: Actor Roger E. Mosley, best known for his role as the helicopter pilot Theodore "TC" Calvin on the 1980s hit show "Magnum, P.I.," died Sunday, his daughter announced. He was 83.

articles.author: Chuck Johnston
articles.title: More than 860 US flights canceled, 4,000 delayed on Sunday
articles.description: Another wave of airline cancellations and delays is being felt across the United States this weekend.

articles.author: Tami Luhby, CNN
articles.title: Democrats lose effort to cap insulin at $35 for most Americans before passage of Senate reconciliation bill
articles.description: Senate Democrats failed to realize their longstanding goal of lowering the price of insulin for the more than 150 million Americans with private health insurance as the chamber passed their sweeping climate and health care package.

articles.title: Watch: Sen. Chris Coons explains compromise made with Sen. Kyrsten Sinema in Inflation Reduction Act - CNN Video
articles.description: Sen. Chris Coons (D-DE) discusses the challenges of getting the Senate to pass the Inflation Reduction Act and what he says it will do to solve health care and climate change issues if it is passed by the House and signed into law by President Biden.

articles.author: Tami Luhby and Katie Lobosco, CNN
articles.title: What's in the Manchin-Schumer deal on climate, health care and taxes
articles.description: The Democrats' budget reconciliation package, which gained more heft after West Virginia Sen. Joe Manchin agreed to add back several climate and tax provisions, was passed Sunday by the Senate on a party-line vote.
articles.content: (CNN)The Democrats' budget reconciliation package, which gained more heft after West Virginia Sen. Joe Manchin agreed to add back several climate and tax provisions,was passed Sunday by the Senate on… [+16133 chars]

articles.author: Clare Foran and Ali Zaslav, CNN
articles.title: Senate 'vote-a-rama' continues as Democrats eye finish line for sweeping climate and health care bill
articles.description: The Senate is continuing to work Sunday on a series of back-to-back amendment votes as Democrats hope to pass their sweeping health care and climate package.

articles.author: CNN staff
articles.title: READ: Inflation Reduction Act -- Democrats' sweeping climate and health care bill
articles.description: The Democratic-backed bill known as the Inflation Reduction Act would represent the largest climate investment in US history. It would also make major changes to health care policy and impose new taxes to pay for it. Read the bill:

articles.author: Opinion by Richard Galant, CNN
articles.title: Opinion: What started in Kansas upends American politics
articles.description: In "The Wizard of Oz," a tornado sends Dorothy spinning into the "Merry Old Land of Oz." Last week it was what Politico called a "political earthquake" in Kansas that sent the national debate over abortion into a new and unpredictable phase.
articles.content:

articles.author: Nouran Salahieh and Elizabeth Wolfe, CNN
articles.title: More human remains discovered in Lake Mead's receding waters
articles.description: This is the fourth time human remains have been found at Lake Mead National Recreation Area since May.

articles.author: Opinion by Frida Ghitis
articles.title: Opinion: Biden is racking up wins but getting no love for it
articles.description: For a president who so many people believe is failing, Joe Biden sure is suddenly notching up an impressive string of victories, writes Frida Ghitis. Is it only a matter of time before Biden's polls catch up with the new wave of accomplishments?
